item.title: Wordle Python Cli
item.description: Bandwagon jumping trigger warning. Decided to write a Wordle clone as a Python based CLI. Leveraged the very excellent rich and the older but still excellent dateparser. Nothing super special, just lets you choose a date for the word. Hopefully soon I’ll write a solver. Also looking at Chris Lomont’s excellent solver/optimizer written in c# to try against my code
item.content:
Bandwagon jumping trigger warning. Decided to write a Wordle clone as a Python based CLI. Leveraged the very excellent rich and the older but still excellent dateparser. Nothing super special, just lets you choose a date for the word.

Hopefully soon I’ll write a solver. Also looking at Chris Lomont’s excellent solver/optimizer written in c# to try against my code

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post using Hugo on my GitHub pages account. I’ve wanted to write more blog content with some interesting things I discover in my work, so this is my attempt to do that. Thanks for reading!
item.content: This is my first post using Hugo on my GitHub pages account. I’ve wanted to write more blog content with some interesting things I discover in my work, so this is my attempt to do that. Thanks for reading!
